comments.body: You do not need to unpack if you ship the license, but I guess we leave this in and hope upstream will ship a license at some point?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +15,19 @@  script:
    - gem install --norc -l -V --ignore-dependencies {{ name }}-{{ version }}.gem
    - gem unpack {{ name }}-{{ version }}.gem
  skip: {{ win }}
